pullRequest.title: Fixed latency monitor to measure actual latency of event processing
pullRequest.bodyText: It should measure the difference between the current wall clock time and the timestamp of the event being processed.

commit.message:
Fixed latency monitor to measure actual latency of event processing

It should measure the difference between the current wall clock time and the timestamp of the event being processed.

nodes.bodyText: Did you intent this constructor to be protected?

commit.message:
Fine tuning

- Use the Builder paradigm for the micrometer
EventProcessorLatencyMonitor
- Deprecate static build methods in favor of builder class
- Remove usages of static build methods in favor of builder
- Add javadoc wherever it's missing
- Adjust warning suppressions
- Adjust indentation according to style guide

#1652
